ImageGen_generateImage.name: ImageGen_generateImage
ImageGen_generateImage.description: Generates an image with the given description

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A detailed description of the image

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The generated image size. Defaults to 256x256

description.description: A detailed description of the image

size.description: The generated image size. Defaults to 256x256

ImageGen_generateImage.returns: The location of the image file
